func_description: Summary of the Chart of Accounts
Enter and Manage GL (and other) batches
General Ledger Trial Balance - Control Accts
Revenue and Expense by subfund, fund, or batch
Create, open, close, and archive accounting periods
Report on all funds managed by a particular person
Revenue & Expense by Period and Classification
Liabilities accrued and paid during period(s)
Research GL transactions, journals, and batches.
